name: Tethered by the Storm
description: We had big plans for this game and will continue to work on it after the jam is over as we didn't have a chance to build everything we wanted. Right now you can see some of the mechanics but nothing is finished unfortunately. We will build a game here about Prometheus who, after stealing the fire of the Gods, was punished and left to be tortured. However Prometheus brakes free and seeks to find justice.
